mapper.select: SELECT g.title AS title, g.price AS price, c.genrename AS genrename, g.info AS info, i.path AS path FROM item g, image i, category c WHERE i.imgno=g.imgno AND c.genreno=g.genreno

SELECT * FROM (SELECT i.path AS path, g.title AS title, c.genrename AS genrename, g.regdate AS regdate FROM item g, category c, image i WHERE i.imgno=g.imgno AND c.genreno=g.genreno ORDER BY regdate DESC) WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 8

SELECT * FROM (SELECT i.path AS path, g.title AS title, c.genrename AS genrename, a.amount AS amount FROM item g, category c, image i, amount a WHERE i.imgno=g.imgno AND a.itemno = g.itemno AND c.genreno=g.genreno AND a.genreno = c.genreno ORDER BY amount DESC) WHERE rownum BETWEEN 1 AND 8
